name: duplicati
description: Duplicati is a backup client that stores encrypted, incremental backups on cloud storage services or local disks. It has a web interface for scheduling, restoring, and configuring backup jobs, and runs well on headless servers.
features: Encrypted backups: Protect data with AES-256 encryption before uploading to storage destinations for security.
Incremental backups: Store only changed blocks to minimize storage space and bandwidth usage over time.
Cloud storage support: Back up to S3, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, and 20+ other cloud providers or local destinations.
Scheduling: Automate backup jobs to run daily, weekly, or on custom schedules without manual intervention.
Deduplication: Eliminate redundant data across backups to reduce storage costs and improve efficiency.
Retention policies: Configure automatic deletion of old backups based on age or count to manage storage limits.
Web interface: Configure, monitor, and restore backups through a browser-based dashboard from any device.
Disaster recovery: Restore individual files, folders, or complete systems from any backup point in time.
